videos.title: Claude Code Creator 8-Step Workflow
videos.creator: Boris Cherny
videos.description: The creator reveals his exact workflow: 10-15 parallel sessions, Opus 4.5, /commit-push-pr command, and verification loops for 2-3x quality.

videos.title: Turn Claude Code into UI Designer using Playwright MCP
videos.creator: Patrick Ellis
videos.description: Give Claude Code visual capabilities using Playwright MCP. Covers orchestration layers, iterative agentic loops, and custom design reviewer subagents.

videos.title: Build AI Life Copilot
videos.creator: Alex Finn
videos.description: Build a 'Claude Life' operating system with /researcher, /daily_brief, and /brain_dump commands. 5 automation techniques from $300K platform creator.

videos.search_query: Peter Yang Claude Code YouTube research agent
videos.title: Claude Code: Build YouTube Research Agent in 15 Min
videos.creator: Peter Yang
videos.description: Build a YouTube AI research agent using slash commands and yt-dlp without API keys. Spec-to-code workflow and batch processing.

videos.search_query: Edmund Yong Claude Code subagents MCP memory
videos.title: Claude Code Sub-agents & MCP Tutorial
videos.creator: Edmund Yong
videos.description: Deep dive into memory management, sub-agents for task delegation, and MCP server integration including Context7, Supabase, Playwright.

videos.title: Automate Your Life with Claude Code in 50 Min
videos.creator: Teresa Torres
videos.description: 3-layer context system (global, project, reference), /today command for daily tasks, and pair-writing workflows. Runs entire life with two Claude terminals.

videos.search_query: Master Claude Code Technical Founders Patrick Ellis
videos.title: Master Claude Code: 3 Technical Founders
videos.creator: Patrick Ellis / Seattle Tech
videos.description: Proven daily workflows from three technical founders. Agent swarms, background agents for CI/CD, and custom team commands.

videos.search_query: Skills vs MCP vs Subagents Claude Code decision
videos.title: Skills vs MCP vs Subagents
videos.creator: Solo Swift Crafter
videos.description: Quick 9-min decision framework. Skills = always-on context, MCP = external tools, Subagents = parallel/isolated work.

videos.title: Claude Code Masterclass
videos.creator: CS Dojo
videos.description: Comprehensive 20-min beginner masterclass. Fundamentals, essential features, best practices, and Super Voice Assistant demo.

videos.description: How the AI-native team works: feedback every 10 minutes, prototypes over docs, designers shipping production code. 3 best tips for CLAUDE.md.
